==Trivia==
* The strange vase was a gift from [[Kaeya]], which he used to discreetly return [[Diluc]]'s [[Vision]] after the latter's return to Mondstadt.<ref>{{Ref/Manga|16}}</ref>
** In [[A Child's Secret]], Diluc claims not to remember what happened to the vase when Kaeya questions him about it. [[Reckless Pallad]] points out that he saw one inside the Dawn Winery.
* In the English version of the manga, the manor is called "'''Diluc Manor'''."<ref>{{Ref/Manga|2}}</ref>
* In the [[Genius Invokation TCG]] card for [[Dawn Winery (Support Card)|Dawn Winery]], the manor is called "'''Manor of Daybreak'''."
